summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley, discussing a link to a news article. The email indicates a request for confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase, suggesting a connection to financial matters.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating his involvement in the communication regarding a news article.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, suggesting a professional relationship with Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are engaged in a professional correspondence, indicating a relationship that may involve business or financial matters.

keyFacts: The email was sent on June 14, 2009.
The subject of the email includes a link to a news article.
Confidential treatment was requested by JPMorgan Chase in relation to the content of the email.
